TypeSignature.Value: public interface DatePickerContentControl : IDisposable, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ContentControlBase, System.ComponentModel.IComponent, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

.class public interface auto ansi abstract DatePickerContentControl implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ContentControlBase, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.IDisposable, class System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

summary.span: 表示文档上的日期选取器控件。

span.span: Represents a date picker control on a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供允许用户选择日期的日历。A provides a calendar that enables users to select a date. 最终用户单击控件中的下拉箭头时，就会显示日历。The calendar appears when the end user clicks the drop-down arrow in the control. 若要指定所显示日期的格式, 请使用和属性。To specify the format of the date that is displayed, use the and properties. 若要选择区域日历, 请使用属性。To choose a regional calendar, use the property. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 内容控件Content Controls 是八种类型的内容控件之一, 可用于在 Microsoft Office Word 中设计文档和模板。The is one of eight types of content controls that you can use to design documents and templates in Microsoft Office Word. 内容控件具有一个用户界面 (UI), 该界面具有像窗体这样的受控输入。Content controls have a user interface (UI) that has controlled input like a form. 你可以使用内容控件来防止用户编辑文档或模板的受保护节, 还可以将内容控件绑定到数据源。You can use content controls to prevent users from editing protected sections of the document or template, and you can also bind content controls to a data source. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls)。For more information, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls). ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个新添加到文档的开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 该示例还会修改控件显示日期的格式。The example also modifies the format in which the control displays dates. 此版本适用于文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddDatePickerControlAtSelection`从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddDatePickerControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#200](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/DatePicker.cs#200)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#200](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/DatePicker.vb#200)] 此版本适用于应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisAddIn`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddDatePickerControlAtSelection`从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddDatePickerControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#200](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/DatePicker.cs#200)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#200](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/DatePicker.vb#200)]

summary.span: 获取一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 当前实例的 。

span.span: Gets a that represents the current instance of Microsoft Office Word.

value.span: 一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 当前实例的 。

span.span: A that represents the current instance of Microsoft Office Word.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性公开有关 Word 的当前实例、应用于该实例的选项以及在实例中打开的当前文档的信息。The property exposes information about the current instance of Word, the options applied to that instance, and the current documents open within the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Copy() cil managed

summary.span: 将 从文档复制到剪贴板。

span.span: Copies the from the document to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法时, 原始文件仍保留在文档中。When you use the method, the original remains on the document. 的副本(包括所有文本和属性设置) 将添加到剪贴板。A copy of the , including all text and property settings, is added to the Clipboard.

summary.span: 获取一个 32 位整数，该整数指示已在其中创建 的应用程序。

span.span: Gets a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the was created.

value.span: 一个 32 位整数，该整数指示已在其中创建该控件的应用程序。

span.span: A 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the control was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是在 Word 中创建的, 则属性返回十六进制数字 4D535744, 它表示字符串`MSWD`。If the was created in Word, the property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string `MSWD`. 此字符串是 Word 的四字符创建者代码。This string is the four-character creator code for Word.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Cut() cil managed

summary.span: 从文档中移除 ，然后将其添加到剪贴板中。

span.span: Removes the from the document and adds it to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法时, 原始将从文档中移除。When you use the method, the original is removed from the document. 的副本(包括所有文本和属性设置) 将添加到剪贴板。A copy of the , including all text and property settings, is added to the Clipboard.

summary.span: 获取或设置在 中显示的日历的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of calendar that is displayed in the .

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值取决于操作系统的当前区域设置。

span.span: The default depends on the current locale setting of the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认日历类型取决于操作系统的区域设置。The default calendar type depends on the locale setting of the operating system. 例如, 区域设置英语 (美国) 的默认日历类型为`wdCalendarWestern`。For example, the default calendar type for the locale English (United States) is `wdCalendarWestern`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串指定 显示日期所用的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies the format in which the displays dates.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串指定 显示日期所用的格式。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the displays dates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认日期格式是 Microsoft Office Word 中指定的格式设置, 通常取决于操作系统的区域设置。The default date format is the format setting specified in Microsoft Office Word, which usually depends on the locale setting of the operating system. 例如, 区域设置英语 (美国) 日期的默认格式是`M/dd/yyyy`。For example, the default format of dates for the locale English (United States) is `M/dd/yyyy`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个新添加到文档的开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 该示例使用属性以格式`MMMM d, yyyy`显示日期。The example uses the property to display dates in the format `MMMM d, yyyy`. 此版本适用于文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddDatePickerControlAtSelection`从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddDatePickerControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#200](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/DatePicker.cs#200)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#200](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/DatePicker.vb#200)] 此版本适用于应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisAddIn`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddDatePickerControlAtSelection`从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddDatePickerControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#200](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/DatePicker.cs#200)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#200](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/DatePicker.vb#200)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 中显示的日期的语言格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the language format of the date that is displayed in the .

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的默认值取决于 Microsoft Office Word 中指定的编辑语言。The default value of the property depends on the editing language specified in Microsoft Office Word. 例如, 英语 (美国) 的默认语言格式是`wdEnglishUS`。For example, the default language format for English (United States) is `wdEnglishUS`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一种格式， 会以此格式将数据保存到自定义 XML 部件。

span.span: Gets or sets the format in which the saves dates in a custom XML part.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为wdContentControlDateStorageDateTime。

span.span: The default is wdContentControlDateStorageDateTime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果绑定到文档中的*自定义 XML 部件*, 则属性指定控件如何以 XML 保存日期。 If the is bound to a *custom XML part* in the document, the property specifies how the control saves dates in XML. 您可以保留日期作为 xml 架构日期 (`xsd:date`)、xml 架构日期/时间 (`xsd:dateTime`) 或文本。You can persist dates as an XML schema date (`xsd:date`), an XML schema date/time (`xsd:dateTime`), or as text. 有关将内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件的详细信息, 请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls)和[自定义 xml 部件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview)。For more information about binding content controls to custom XML parts, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls) and [Custom XML Parts Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview).

summary.span: 获取用于设置 中的文本格式的字符样式的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the character style that is used to format text in the .

value.span: 用于设置 中的文本格式的字符样式的名称。

span.span: The name of the character style to use to format text in the .

value.span: 默认值为**默认段落字体**。

span.span: The default is **Default Paragraph Font**.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可从文档删除 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the can be deleted from the document.

value.span: 如果可从文档删除 ，则为 ；如果不能删除此控件，则为 。

span.span: if the cannot be deleted from the document; if the control can be deleted.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止用户编辑的内容, 请使用属性。To prevent users from editing the contents of a , use the property. 有关如何使用保护文档部分的详细信息, 请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls)和[如何:使用内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls)保护文档的各个部分。For more information about how to use a to protect a part of a document, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls) and [How to: Protect Parts of Documents by Using Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls).

exception.span: 属性为 时，设置此属性。

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示能否编辑 的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the contents of the can be edited.

value.span: 如果不能编辑 的内容，则为 ；如果可以编辑控件内容，则为 。

span.span: if the contents of the cannot be edited; if the contents of the control can be edited.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止用户从文档中删除, 请使用属性。To prevent users from deleting a from the document, use the property. 有关使用保护文档的一部分的详细信息, 请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls)和[如何:使用内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls)保护文档的各个部分。For more information about using a to protect a part of a document, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls) and [How to: Protect Parts of Documents by Using Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 是否可以包含换行符。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the can contain line breaks.

value.span: 如果 可以包含换行符，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the can contain line breaks; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

summary.span: 获取 的父级。

span.span: Gets the parent of the .

value.span: 一个对象，表示 的父级。

span.span: An object that represents the parent of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的父级是包含控件的对象。The parent of the is the object in which the control is contained. 例如, 如果控件位于文档的主体中, 则此属性将返回一个对象。For example, if the control is in the body of the document, this property will return a object. 若要获取 或中包含的的父控件, 请使用属性。To get the parent control of a that is contained in a or a , use the property.

summary.span: 获取嵌套在另一个内容控件内的 的父内容控件。

span.span: Gets the parent content control of a that is nested in another content control.

value.span: 一个system.windows.controls.contentcontrol> , 表示在其中嵌套的内容控件; 例如,如果未嵌套在另一个内容控件中, 则为。

span.span: A Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControl that represents the content control in which the is nested; if the is not nested in another content control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和控件是只能包含嵌套内容控件的内容控件的类型。The and controls are the only types of content controls that can contain nested content controls.

summary.span: 获取或设置在用户操作或某个其他操作更改文本之前在 中显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the until the text is changed by a user action or some other operation.

value.span: 在用户操作或某个其他操作更改文本之前，在控件中显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed in the control until the text is changed by a user action or some other operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在用户选择日期或在控件中键入新值或用数据源中的数据填充控件之前, 会显示占位符文本。The placeholder text is displayed until a user selects a date or types a new value in the control, or the control is populated with data from a data source. 若要将占位符文本设置为 或中的文本, 请使用方法。To set the placeholder text to text that is in a or a , use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个新添加到文档的开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 该示例将属性设置为提示用户选择日期的字符串。The example sets the property to a string that prompts the user to choose a date. 此版本适用于文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddDatePickerControlAtSelection`从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddDatePickerControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#200](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/DatePicker.cs#200)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#200](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/DatePicker.vb#200)] 此版本适用于应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisAddIn`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddDatePickerControlAtSelection`从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddDatePickerControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#200](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/DatePicker.cs#200)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#200](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/DatePicker.vb#200)]

summary.span: 获取一个 ，表示 的内容。

span.span: Gets a that represents the contents of the .

value.span: 一个 ，表示 的内容。

span.span: A that represents the contents of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可访问控件中的文本格式和其他文本属性。Use the property to access the formatting of the text in the control and other text properties. 有关对象的详细信息, 请参阅[Word 对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/word-object-model-overview)。For more information about objects, see [Word Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/word-object-model-overview). 若要仅访问在中显示的文本, 请使用属性。To access only the text that is displayed in the , use the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetPlaceholderText (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock BuildingBlock = null, Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range = null, string Text = "");

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetPlaceholderText(class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock BuildingBlock, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range, string Text) cil managed

span.span: A that contains the placeholder text.
A that contains the placeholder text.
The placeholder text.

summary.span: 将 、 或字符串中的文本显示为 中的占位符文本。

span.span: Displays text that is in a , a , or a string as the placeholder text in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 占位符文本将显示, 直到用户编辑控件、用数据源中的数据填充控件或删除控件的内容。The placeholder text is displayed until a user edits the control, the control is populated with data from a data source, or the control's contents are deleted. 调用方法时仅使用其中一个参数。Only one of the parameters is used when you call the method. 如果指定了多个参数, 则 Microsoft Office Word 使用第一个指定的参数。If more than one parameter is specified, Microsoft Office Word uses the first specified parameter. 如果省略所有参数, 则占位符文本为空字符串。If all parameters are omitted, the placeholder text is an empty string. 若要获取的占位符文本, 请使用属性。To get the placeholder text of a , use the property. 还可以使用此属性将占位符文本设置为字符串。You can also use this property to set the placeholder text to a string.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 当前是否显示占位符文本。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the is currently displaying placeholder text.

value.span: 如果 当前显示占位符文本，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is currently displaying placeholder text; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在用户操作或某个其他操作更改了中的文本之前, 将显示占位符文本。The placeholder text is displayed until the text in the is changed by a user action or some other operation. 若要获取或设置占位符文本, 请使用属性或方法。To get or set the placeholder text, use the property or the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置要与 关联的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that you want to associate with the .

value.span: 一个要与 关联的字符串。

span.span: A string that you want to associate with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当文档打开时 , 可以使用属性存储与关联的字符串。You can use the property to store a string that is associated with the while the document is open. 若要按标记查找内容控件, 请使用方法。To find a content control by its tag, use the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在编辑 时是否自动将该控件从文档中删除。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the is automatically deleted from the document when the control is edited.

value.span: 如果要在编辑 时自动将该控件删除，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is automatically deleted when the control is edited; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性为`true` ,则当用户键入控件时, 或者以编程方式更改控件中的文本时, 将自动删除。 If the property is `true`, the is automatically deleted when the user types in the control, or when the text in the control is changed programmatically. 当自动从文档中删除时, 该控件中的文本将保留在文档中。When the is automatically deleted from the document, the text in the control remains in the document.

exception.span: 属性为 时，设置此属性。

summary.span: 获取或设置 中的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text in the .

value.span: 中的文本。

span.span: The text in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要访问控件中的文本格式和其他文本属性, 请使用属性。To access the formatting of the text in the control and other text properties, use the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of the .

value.span: 的标题。

span.span: The title of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击标题时, 标题将显示在的边框中。The title is displayed in the border of the when the user clicks it.

summary.span: 获取一个 ，表示 与自定义 XML 部件中元素之间的绑定。

span.span: Gets an that represents the binding between the and an element in a custom XML part.

value.span: 一个 ，表示 与自定义 XML 部件中元素之间的绑定。

span.span: An that represents the binding between the and an element in a custom XML part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性将绑定到文档中嵌入的 XML 部分 (也称为*自定义 xml 部件*) 中的元素。 Use the property to bind a to an element in a piece of XML (also named *custom XML part*) that is embedded in the document. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls)和[自定义 XML 部件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview)。For more information, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls) and [Custom XML Parts Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview). ## Examples 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例, 请参阅[演练:将内容控件绑定到自定义](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts)XML 部件。For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see [Walkthrough: Binding Content Controls to Custom XML Parts](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-binding-content-controls-to-custom-xml-parts).
